entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
